GSD.description:
video: fbdev: cirrusfb: check pixclock to avoid divide by zero

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit c656d04247a2654ede5cead2ecbf83431dad5261. For more details please see the references link.
